## Summary

Status of Lighthouse beacon chain: 1/3 validators synced to block 1500000.
Lighthouse is working on fixing issues related to validator set changes.

Devnet status:
- Beacon Chain devnet at block 1499999, with some minor issues reported by Teku and Prysm clients.
- Execution layer (Goerli) devnet: no major updates or concerns mentioned.


No specific deadlines were discussed in the meeting.
